name: Violent Selection
description:
Violent Selection takes place on a fictional world where the T.R.A.U.M.A. Research Center for New Social Behaviour Studies is developing the Unnatural Selection Case Study #9, with Mr. Venturi as the subject. The setting is a condominium, where Mr. Venturi must survive seven levels packed with enemies in order to succeed. Will he be able to do it? Or is he going to reach for more?

Violent Selection is primarily a story-driven, bloody and violent top-down shooter. Below you can find the main features of the game:

>Main features:
- Seven levels in a condominium setting - free space, reception and five floors of apartments;
- Differents types of weapons to choose from, as well as fists;
- Beat 'em up elements;
- Cartoonized gore with excessive blood and brains (pixel style);
- Top-down with 360 degrees movement;
- Stealth elements: crawl to get near the enemy unnoticed and finish him;
- Speedrun timer;
- Speedrun leaderboard.
